resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."

OSTALLO is the App developed by XOXYTECH Pvt. Ltd. If you use the OSTALLO App it clearly implies that you agree to abide by all the terms and conditions prescribed by the XOXYTECH Pvt. Ltd.OSTALLO is meant for general information. Visitors may download information available on the App for non-commercial, personal use only and no part of information, either in whole or part, shall be printed, distributed, transmitted, modified, displayed or otherwise reproduced without the prior written permission of XOXYTECH Pvt. Ltd.XOXYTECH Pvt. Ltd. reserves the right to make changes, extend or partly/completely delete any material/content on the App and all other information including the offers, if any, without notice. No responsibility will be accepted by the XOXYTECH Pvt. Ltd. for damage or loss or any kind of hardships or expense encountered by its students or any other person or entities for such changes, additions, deletions, omissions or errors, no matter how they are caused.XOXYTECH Pvt. Ltd. may share information about the visitors and/or users of its website to communicate with the concerned visitors and/or users or otherwise as deemed necessary.Use of any information at the website is at ownerâ€™s own risk. While every effort is made to secure our network communications, however, XOXYTECH Pvt. Ltd. may not always be able to ensure the privacy of online communications and other information of the visitors, unless otherwise specifically provided for. Moreover, any information that one provides using this App(s) may become part of a public record subject to disclosure under the relevant regulations from time to time.

OSTALLO provides you information about hostels around you. Our platform is indeed a great alternative to physical searching for hostel seekers. OSTALLO provides you everything that you might want to know about hostels like facilities, address, pictures, reviews, and ratings.
Already have an account? Login here\
